BendixKing Channel Newsletter | August 2019 <[[http://www.bendixKing.com]]> Welcome to the Family!
By now you may have heard TruTrak is now a part of the BendixKing family. TruTrak has long been a leader in the low cost and experimental autopilots and is a natural fit in the BendixKing company. Andrew Barker and many of his TruTrak employees will join the BendixKing team to continue to foster innovation and accelerate product development.
What this means for you
- As a BendixKing channel partner, you will now have access to the entire TruTrak portfolio, which also contributes to your BendixKing revenue goals for 2019. - This will round out BendixKing’s offering in the experimental market giving you as channel partners access to a broader customer base. - BendixKIng will provide custom channel partner training on TruTrak products to assist your sales teams and installers.
To view the official press release please click here <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/honeywell-to-acquire-trutrak-flight-systems]]>.
Sales Information
To find out more about placing orders for the TruTrak products please contact your BendixKing area sales manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
